New Records: Parker Meadows hit the 2nd-fastest pitch a Tigers player has homered off of in the pitch-tracking era (2008) with a pitch of 100.7 MPH, joining Jeimer Candelario (102.1 mph) on September 7, 2018
Key Match Events: Parker Meadows hit a go-ahead grand slam in the bottom of the ninth inning to turn a 3-0 deficit into a 4-3 lead, ultimately leading to a 4-3 victory for the Detroit Tigers
Post-Match Reflections: The win brings the Tigers to 71-70 on the season, 5.0 games back of the third and final wild card spot in the American League, with opportunities to gain more games in the standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers scored four runs in the bottom of the ninth inning to stun the San Diego Padres at Petco Park
Others: The game was a dramatic comeback win for the Detroit Tigers, with Parker Meadows' grand slam being both dramatic and historic
